CustomField.description:
Dictates the number of times logs can be published (via Logger.publish() or Logger.logAndPublish()) in a single transaction. Lower this number if you run into PublishImmediateDml Limits.
Maximum is 150, 100 is recommended for most organizations.
Note: Only the Organizational Defaults record will be referenced. Do not refer to this value on individual Settings records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Maximum is 150, 100 is recommended for most organizations.
Note: Only the Organizational Defaults record will be referenced. Do not refer to this value on individual Settings records.
CustomField.label: Max Publish Calls
